--- title: "The Cereal Convention" subtitle: "A Kingdom Death Campaign Log" format: html: css: styles.css toc: true toc-depth: 2 echo: false editor: visual execute: render-on-save: true tools: - mermaid --- # Settlement Overview > _There is no sanity clause_ [^11] [^11]: Sandman Volume 3: The Doll's House ::: {.column-page} ::: {.column width="40%"} ### Campaign Information - **Settlement Name**: The Cereal Convention - **Campaign**: People of the Lantern - **Boss**: Watcher - **Finale**: Gold Smoke Knight ::: ::: {.column width="30%"} ![](imgs/cereal-cover.png) ::: ::: ### Principles | New Life | Death | Society | |----------------|---------------|-----------------| | Protect the Young | Cannibalize | Accept the Darkness | ## Nodes :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="30%"} ### Quarry ```{mermaid} graph TB A(Crimson Crocodile) B(Smog Singers) C(Sunstalker) D(King) A --> B B --> C C --> D ``` ::: ::: {.column width="30%"} ### Nemesis ```{mermaid} graph TB A(Manhunter) B(Atnas) C(Black Knight) A --> B B --> C ``` ::: ::: {.column width="30%"} ### Boss & Finale ```{mermaid} graph TB A(Watcher) B(Gold Smoke Knight) A --> B ``` ::: :::: ::: {.column-screen-inset} ::: # Campaign Log ## Prologue: Devour the White Lion > _A purging of ashes down her hourglass figure
Inscribed on my heart; "Devour me, Colossus"_ [^0] [^0]: Ne Obliviscaris - Devour Me, Colossus (Part I​)​: Blackholes ::::{.column-screen} ![](imgs/CrimsonCroc.png) ::: :::: {.column-page} :::{.column width=70%} ::: {.cell execution_count=2} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2} ```{=html}
Story Event Innovation Monster Level Deaths Notable Event
Devour The White Lion Language Crimson Crocodile 0 1 The Crimson Crocodile caved in Patrick Bateman's chest with three repeated torso attacks
``` ::: ::: ::: :::{.column width=20%} **Starting Characters** - Carrie - Patrick Bateman - Freddie Krueger - Charlie (_Hereditary_) ::: :::: ## Year 1: First Crimson Day > _I walk a road, horizons change
The tournament's begun_ [^1] [^1]: King Crimson - The Court of the Crimson King ::: {.column-page-inset} ::: {.cell execution_count=3} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3} ```{=html}
Settlement Event Story Event Innovation Monster Level Notable Event
First Crimson Day First Story Ammonia Crimson Crocodile 1 On the Hunt, three people rolled criticals in the Gambler's Game of Death and gained +1 permanent Luck
``` ::: ::: ::: ::: {.column-page} ![](imgs/year1.png) ::: ## Year 2: Death of Song > _And we sang dirges in the dark
The day the music died_ [^2] [^2]: Don McLean - American Pie :::{.column-page-inset} ::: {.cell execution_count=4} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=4} ```{=html}
Settlement Event Story Event Innovation Monster Level Notable Event

``` ::: ::: :::{.column-screen} ![](imgs/SmogSingers.png) ::: ::: ## Year 3: Velvet Fog > _A choice of gold or velvet
Do I go on, or follow the crown in the smoke?_ [^3] [^3]: Between the Buried and Me - Option Oblivion :::{.column-margin} ![](imgs/year3.png) ::: :::{.column-body} ::: {.cell execution_count=5} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=5} ```{=html}
Settlement Event Story Event Innovation Monster Level Deaths Notable Event
Velvet Fog Inner Lantern Smog Singers 1 1 Gave birth to five children in one year
``` ::: ::: ::: ## Year 4: Haunted Knight > _And how can we win
When fools can be kings?_ [^4] [^4]: Muse - Knights of Cydonia ::: {.column-margin} ![](imgs/year4.png) ::: :::{.column-body} ::: {.cell execution_count=6} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=6} ```{=html}
Settlement Event Story Event Innovation Monster Level Deaths Notable Event
Haunted Hooded Knight Hovel Smog Singers 1 2 Hooded Knight showed up, smoked two people, and left
``` ::: ::: ::: ## Year 5: The Hanged Plaguebearer > _A flourishing plague consumes the masses
Emaciated figures dying in the streets_ [^5] [^5]: The Faceless - Pestilence :::{.column-body} ::: {.cell execution_count=7} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=7} ```{=html}
Settlement Event Story Event Innovation Monster Level Deaths Notable Event
Plague The Hanged Man Scrap Smelting Manhunter 1 0 Scored the Death Blow against the Manhunter and the settlement let Charlie die of the plague so they could innovate
Hands of Heat Lantern Oven Smog Singers 2 1 Still defeated first level 2 fight, despite hitting the trap 3 times and drawing the Legendary AI card, all within the first few turns
``` ::: ::: ::: :::{.column-page} ![](imgs/year5.png) ::: ## Year 6: Unwanted Gifts > _I was ignorant, I was worldly
I was shown into a lifetime's experiences_ [^6] [^6]: Warforged - We've Been Here Before :::{.column-page-inset} ::: {.cell execution_count=8} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=8} ```{=html}
Settlement Event Story Event Innovation Monster Level Notable Event
Knighting Unwanted Gifts Settlement Watch Crimson Crocodile 2 Annabelle scored 5 wounds in one turn using the paired razor cymbal after we hit the trap turn 1
``` ::: ::: ::: ![](imgs/year6.png) ## Year 7: Self-invited Lights in the Sky > _This organic antenna mounts
As the esoteric crown of my vertebrae_ [^7] [^7]: Job For a Cowboy - Beyond the Chemical Doorway :::{.column-page-inset} ::: {.cell execution_count=9} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=9} ```{=html}

Birth Self-Invited Guests, Lights in the Sky Symposium Smog Singers 2 1 Ripley died during a blitzkrieg where we killed the monster after going only three times and a cursed Santa hat was found in the settlement

The immense conqueror hides the sun_ [^8] [^8]: The Faceless - Planetary Duality II: A Prophecies Fruition :::{.column-page-inset} ::: {.cell execution_count=10} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=10} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ::: :::{.column-screen} ![](imgs/year9.png) ::: ## Year 10: A Decade of Statues > _The waves have pushed me to where I need to be_ [^10] [^10]: Between the Buried and Me - Foam Born: (B) The Decade of Statues # Timelines ## Campaign Timeline :::{.column-screen} ::: {.cell execution_count=12} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](index_files/figure-html/cell-13-output-1.png){width=1644 height=374} ::: ::: ::: ## Population Timeline ::: {.column-screen} ::: {.cell execution_count=13} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](index_files/figure-html/cell-14-output-1.png){width=1270 height=284 fig-align='center'} ::: ::: :::
